attributes.action: Recognise the effort and hardship of the sailors, in the form of a Medal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for all those who participated in the 
'Cod Wars' during the  1960/70s.   This period  seems to be a forgotten, unrecognised period of time, when many service men operated in hostile and dangerous circumstances in hazardous conditions. The qualifying time for the medal to be 28 days in the area, but need not be a consecutive period i.e Two
periods of say 7 and 21 days to count for the award
